---
title: "New project workflow"
date: "2024-06-01"
---

This guide will cover a suggested workflow for when you want to start working on a new project.   
Specifically, it will cover: 

* Using the `usethis` package
* Creating a new R-project
* Using it with git
* Pushing it to a remote repository using github
* Using `renv` to keep track of the packages used in the project
* Suggesting a simple git workflow for collaborating on your project 

Let's get started!
